LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Plating.label: multilayered dermal plating
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Plating.description: By layering chitin plates under the skin and binding cracks with rubbery flesh, resistance to small arms fire is radically increased.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Flame.label: flame retardant skin
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Flame.description: By lining the skin with glands that can quickly release flame retardant slime on the body as well as disspating heat, the user becomes extremely resistant to heat and flame.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Insulation.label: variable insulation skin
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Skin_Insulation.description: By creating skin with both high-volume sweat glands and hairs that can either retain or release heat, the user becomes comfortable in a massive range of temperatures.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Ribcage.label: calcium-alloy ribcage
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Ribcage.description: By altering the composition of the ribcage into a calcium / metal alloy and encasing the upper body in an organic rubber analogue, the durability of the upper body is immensely increased.
